StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: The Placenta Harbors a Unique Microbiome

Person.Organization: BAYLOR COLLEGE OF MEDICINEUNIVERSITY OF UTAH

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The dataset used for the analyses described in this manuscript were obtained for the database of Genotype and Phenotype (dbGaP) found at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gap [accession number xxxxx]. Samples and associated data for the Placental Microbiome were provided by Kjersti Aagaard-Tillery, M.D., Ph.D. The provider of the dataset gratefully acknowledges support of the NIH Director’s New Innovator Award (K.A. DP2 OD001500), The Burroughs Wellcome Fund Preterm Birth Initiative (K.A.) and the Human Microbiome Project funded by the NIH Director’s Common Fund at the National Institutes of Health (as part of the NIH RoadMap 1.5). All sequencing and adaption of protocols for sequencing low biomass samples were performed at the Baylor College of Medicine Human Genome Sequencing Center (BCM-HGSC), which is funded by direct support from the National Human Genome Research Institute (NHGRI) at NIH [U54 HG004973(BCM), Dr. Richard Gibbs, P.I.]. The author thanks the Alkek Center of Metagenomics and Microbiome Research at the Baylor College of Medicine for their support through the microbiota discovery award (R.G., K.A.).The author also thanks the staff directly involved in clinical recruitment and specimen processing (Jia Chen, Debra Duncan, Irma Guerra, Claire Cook, Milena Pitashny-Hoffman) and the additional faculty who participated with K.A. and J.V. in development of the PeriBank protocol and resource building (Dr. Edwina Popek, Ignatia Van den Veyver, Tom Wheeler, and Michael Belfort). The author is grateful to Tulin Ayvas for assisting with protocol development for DNA isolation and sample processing.
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: The progress report should specifically cite work done that relates to this dataset ["The placenta harbors a unique microbiome"] and not just a generic report for a series of datasets that may have been requested.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.
The data will only be used for research purposes. There are no additional data use limitations.
